wahi.title: Wahi
wahi.company_description: Support by Brookfield company, Wahi empowers homebuyers and sellers with an innovative and resourceful approach to real estate.
wahi.role_description: Wahi is designed by nature as a modern and innovative solution. In this context, the main role of backend developer is to rely on cloud solutions to develop modern and efficient web applications.

solem.title: Solem / Primal
solem.company_description: Development and industrialization of connected objects for irrigation, swimming pools and telecare with 30 years of experience.
solem.role_description: Inside a team of 13 developers, I was in charge of developing web platforms linked to connected devices in domain of irrigation, pool and telecare. This experience was a way to improve good practices for me and my team, using new JS Standards and best integrations.

mysolem.title: MySolem
mysolem.short_description: Management of connected devices for irrigation
mysolem.description: MySolem is a management platform for connected devices for irrigation, for example, irrigation fields, public areas, golf courses, etc. It is developed using the SSR (Server Side Rendering) method, under the SailsJS framework. This fullstack framework is complete because it uses NodeJS to generate its API (with Express), its sockets and its access to MongoDb through its own ORM : Waterline.

myindygo.title: MyIndygo
myindygo.description: MyIndygo is a new project to create business unit in the swimming pool sector. The platform is an extension of MySolem because the technical layer is very close. However, I was able to bring a more modern and more intuitive interface at the level of the front-office.

myattentive.title: MyAttentive
myattentive.short_description: Management of connected devices for telecare
myattentive.description: Telecare services are complex because they must respond to many norms. Functionalally, the platform is very evolved, but due to technological debt, it is very expensive to develop new features. To solve a part of the problem, I have brought my experience on clean code, on the UI/UX, and the setup of pipelines CI/CD.

atim.title: ATIM
atim.company_description: Design and manufacture of connected systems for IoT industry.
atim.role_description:
Standing as unique developer in engineering team, I was in charge of the development of the Atim Cloud Wireless platform, considered as the missing link for the company to provide an end-to-end solution for the IoT industry, which is a growing industry in the world. The role was also filled of various tasks as software engineer, mobile developer, designer, etc.

Projects below are just a few of many projects.

acw.title: ACW Web
acw.short_description: Web app to monitor and manage IoT devices
acw.description:
This platform allow to manage and monitor connected devices to low-power networks as Sigfox or LoRaWAN.
Frontend was designed with AngularJS and backend with NodeJS/Hapi. A particular effort has been made to setup a robust, stable and performant system in production.

acw-mobile.title: ACW Mobile
acw-mobile.description: Considered as a mobile client (Android) of the ACW platform, this project, made together with the student I supervised, was a draft offering only the simplest features limited to a read-only approach of sensors data (temperature, humidity, consumption, etc.).

ble-tracker.title: Low-Power Tracker
ble-tracker.fullTitle: Tracking app using Bluetooth Low Energy and LoRaWAN
ble-tracker.description:
This project is a proof of concept (PoC) for the Carrefour company which wants to geolocate logistics material trucks on the whole France, with only Bluetooth Low Energy sensors and LoRaWAN network for to track the data.
The main interest of this project is in the energy autonomy of the solution and the independence from the operated networks.

We also have been able to do a similar project with the Universitary Hospital of Grenoble city to track medical material by triangulation of LoRaWAN signal

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: The job of web developer is a passion, but it is a difficult job that requires lifelong learning and a permanent questioning. With 7 years of experience, following qualities are the ones describing me the best :

nodejs.title: NodeJS
nodejs.description: SailsJS, SocketIO, Express, Hapi, Joi, Mongoose, PM2

react.title: ReactJS
react.description: Hooks, Redux, Api Context, React Router, NextJS

kangoo.title: Project Kangoo
kangoo.short_description: Share your own items within a community such as your neighborhood, family members or colleagues
kangoo.full_description1: The Kangoo project is a web service for sharing objects between community members. Based on a freemium model, you can create sharing communities (districts, associations, clubs, companies, families) and reserve an object thanks to a planning system.

captainpeage.title: CaptainPÃ©age
captainpeage.short_description: Free calcultor to save money on french highways.
captainpeage.full_description1: CaptainPÃ©age is a project initiated in 2020 in order to step into the world of open-source projects, but also to train me on the NextJS framework which uses React in the form of SSR (Server-Side Rendering). At the same time, I wanted to use the CSS framework: Tailwind.
captainpeage.full_description2:
CaptainPÃ©age is an online service based on the following observation: The toll highways have the particularity of not having a linear pricing, so it is not proportional to the number of kilometers traveled. Based on this observation, CaptainPÃ©age offers a tool using the principle of splitting which consists of exiting at certain tolls on your route and re-entering again.

The interest of this service is therefore economic ðŸ’µ.. It is the opposite of the telepeage solution : loose few time, but save money !
captainpeage.full_description3:
This is a great technological and human challenge. However, I stopped it because retrieving highway pricing data was not already available in open data.

I am currently in contact with the team of transport.data.gouv.fr that will keep me in touch of dataset opening to the public.

tagdroid.title: TAGDroid
tagdroid.short_description: Android app that provides real-time tram and bus timetables for Grenoble city.
tagdroid.full_description1:
Release as the first mobile app for Grenoble city public transport (TAG), TAGdroid provides real-time timetables for tramways and buses, but also other features such as news et current incidents on lines.

The free app has been download more than 30K times, counting 399 ratings with 217 reviews.
tagdroid.full_description2: This is my first app project, allowing me to discover development in Java and POO principles, during my student years (2012). As it is a success, I kept on improve it on my free time.
tagdroid.full_description3: Technically, data fetching consists of scraping a XML webservice page. Sadly, this page became deprecated when TAG disabled it for a new public API. I did not have moment to modify app to fit on new API. So, the app is no longer maintained since 2014.

istre.name: Master 2
istre.subject: Integration of Real-time Embedded Systems
istre.description:
1 year work/study at LIPHY Laboratory (CNRS)
Subject : Design and development of communication, and integration of an embedded system on a scientific device : Subglacior Project
istre.details: Publication in a scientif journal : The SUBGLACIOR drilling probe: concept and design

etcom.name: Master 1
etcom.subject: Ã‰lectronique et TÃ©lÃ©com
etcom.description:
6 months internship at LIPHY Laboratory (CNRS)
Subject : Youth and development of an ultra-sensible spectrometer.
etcom.details: Publication in a scientific journal : Intracavity Laser Absorption Spectroscopy of 13C16O2 near 734 nm

dut-geii2.description:
Electronics option
3 months internship at LEPMI Laboratory (CNRS)
Subject : Design of a scientific test bench control system in LabVIEW.
